member.name: P:VRage.Input.IMyControllerControl.Condition
member.summary: Condition if control should be active

member.name: M:VRage.Input.IMyControllerControl.IsNewPressed
member.summary: Checks if control is newly pressed

member.name: M:VRage.Input.IMyControllerControl.IsNewPressedRepeating
member.summary: Checks if control is newly pressed with repeat feature

member.name: M:VRage.Input.IMyControllerControl.IsNewReleased
member.summary: Checks if control is newly released

member.name: M:VRage.Input.IMyControllerControl.AnalogValue
member.summary: Gets analog value of the control

member.name: M:VRage.Input.MyControl.GetAnalogState
member.summary: Return the analog state between 0 (not pressed at all) and 1 (fully pressed). If a digital button is mapped to an analog control, it can return only 0 or 1.

member.name: M:VRage.Input.MyControl.ToString
member.summary: Causes allocation. Creates single string with list of assigned controls.

member.name: M:VRage.Input.MyControl.ToStringBuilder(System.String)
member.summary: Causes allocation. Creates single StringBuilder with list of assigned controls. Caller takes ownership of returned StringBuilder (it is not stored internally).

member.name: F:VRage.Input.MyControllerHelper.ButtonTextEvaluator
member.summary: Evaluator that can be used to replace button names with their icon.

member.name: T:VRage.Input.MyControllerHelper.FakeControl
member.summary: Loading hints require Controls for displaying, but some things cannot be binded to (any direction on Stick or DPad). For this reason fake controls exist, to be able to display control elements That cannot even have binding

member.name: T:VRage.Input.MyControlStateType
member.summary: Defines states of the control, newly means that control just changed to that state and it will change to next state right after

member.name: F:VRage.Input.MyControlStateType.NEW_PRESSED_REPEATING
member.summary: When control is newly pressed with repeat feature

member.name: F:VRage.Input.MyControlType.JoystickAxis
member.summary: Control is axis (for example sticks on gamepad, anything analog)

member.name: M:VRage.Input.MyVRageInput.GetMousePosition
member.summary: Returns immediatelly current cursor position. Obtains position on every call, it can get cursor data with higher rate than 60 fps

member.name: M:VRage.Input.MyVRageInput.GetGamepadKeyDirections(System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Get the actual and previous gamepad key directions (use the first POV controller). Returns false if this type of input is not available.

member.name: T:VRage.Input.MyJoystickButtonsEnum
member.summary: Buttons enumeration. If you add new button here, don't forget to change value in MyJoystickConstants

member.name: M:VRage.ModAPI.IMyControl.GetAnalogState
member.summary: Return the analog state between 0 (not pressed at all) and 1 (fully pressed). If a digital button is mapped to an analog control, it can return only 0 or 1.
